quotes.quote: That is the saving grace of humor, if you fail no one is laughing at you.
quotes.author: A. Whitney Brown

quotes.quote: Humor is the only test of gravity, and gravity of humor; for a subject which will not bear raillery is suspicious, and a jest which will not bear serious examination is false wit.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Humor is everywhere, in that there's irony in just about anything a human does.
quotes.author: Bill Nye

quotes.quote: All I need to make a comedy is a park, a policeman and a pretty girl.
quotes.author: Charlie Chaplin

quotes.quote: Total absence of humor renders life impossible.
quotes.author: Colette

quotes.quote: A joke was not a single-use item but something you brought out again and again until it fell apart in your hand like a cheap umbrella.
quotes.author: Dick Clark

quotes.quote: If you're at school and you're not that bright or good-looking or popular or whatever, and one day you say something and someone laughs, well, you sort of grab onto it, don't you? you think, well I run funny and I've got this stupid big face and big thighs and no-one fancies me, but at least I can make people laugh. And It's such a nice feeling, making someone laugh, that maybe you get a bit reliant on it. Like, if you're not funny then you're not... anything.
quotes.author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

quotes.quote: Humor is always based on a modicum of truth. Have you ever heard a joke about a father-in-law?
quotes.author: E. B. White

quotes.quote: A sense of humor is part of the art of leadership, of getting along with people, of getting things done.
quotes.author: Edward De Bono

quotes.quote: Humor can be dissected as a frog can, but the thing dies in the process and the innards are discouraging to any but the pure scientific mind.
quotes.author: Horace Walpole

quotes.quote: Humor is by far the most significant activity of the human brain.
quotes.author: Hugh Elliott

quotes.quote: There's nothing like a gleam of humor to reassure you that a fellow human being is ticking inside a strange face.
quotes.author: James Thurber

quotes.quote: The world is a tragedy to those who feel, but a comedy to those who think.
quotes.author: James Thurber

quotes.quote: If there's one thing I know it's God does love a good joke.
quotes.author: Jeph Jacques

quotes.quote: The only rules comedy can tolerate are those of taste, and the only limitations those of libel.
quotes.author: John Kenneth Galbraith

quotes.quote: The wit makes fun of other persons; the satirist makes fun of the world; the humorist makes fun of himself.
quotes.author: Larry Gelbart

quotes.quote: What's the point of havin' a rapier wit if I can't use it to stab people?
quotes.author: Lewis Mumford

quotes.quote: Where humor is concerned there are no standards - no one can say what is good or bad, although you can be sure that everyone will.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: The best defence against misguided arrogance is a keen sense of humour.
quotes.author: Mary Hirsch

quotes.quote: One doesn't have a sense of humor. It has you.
quotes.author: Mel Brooks

quotes.quote: Humor is our way of defending ourselves from life's absurdities by thinking absurdly about them.
quotes.author: Mel Brooks

quotes.quote: Humor is the great thing, the saving thing. The minute it crops up, all our irritations and resentments slip away and a sunny spirit takes their place.
quotes.author: Peter Ustinov

quotes.quote: Humor is a rubber sword - it allows you to make a point without drawing blood.
quotes.author: Pico Iyer

quotes.quote: Humor is just another defense against the universe.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Tragedy is when I cut my finger. Comedy is when you walk into an open sewer and die.
quotes.author: Robert Benchley

quotes.quote: Comedy is simply a funny way of being serious.
quotes.author: Salma Hayek

quotes.quote: Comedy is nothing more than tragedy deferred.
Wit makes its own welcome, and levels all distinctions. No dignity, no learning, no force of character, can make any stand against good wit.
Defining and analyzing humor is a pastime of humorless people.
Life is tough, and if you have the ability to laugh at it you have the ability to enjoy it.
